text: [[img:bullet_emp_magic]][[/img]]Hireling Wizards: Harness multiple Lores of Magic to bolster the Grudgebringers strength and destroy their enemies.||[[img:bullet_emp_offices]][[/img]]Imperial Reinforcements: Can gift newly conquered territories to the Empire in turn for reinforcements.||[[img:bullet_emp_units]][[/img]]Powerful but expensive mercenary units make up this unique and diverse roster.

[[img:bullet_emp_magic]][[/img]]Hireling Wizards: Harness multiple Lores of Magic to bolster the Grudgebringers strength and destroy their enemies.||[[img:bullet_emp_offices]][[/img]]Imperial Reinforcements: Can gift newly conquered territories to the Empire in turn for reinforcements.||[[img:bullet_emp_units]][[/img]]Powerful but expensive mercenary units make up this unique and diverse roster.
While working as a sword-for-hire in the Border Princes, Commander Bernhardt must thwart a Skaven conspiracy, Greenskin Incursions and a Dark Omen that will see him on quests of gold and glory...
